sentences.sCn: 五分之一加仑的波旁威士忌酒

sentences.sContent: ...When you can quote a specific number like a fifth of the patients were able to quit...
...is inhabited by multiple endangered species and irrigates one fifth of China’s land...
...The classic Greek tragedies of the fifth century...
...The fourth graders ate 25% more fruits and vegetables than the fifth graders...

...A study in one Texas school district compared the lunches of fourth graders who did not have food choices with those of fifth graders who could choose either a standard lunch or select from a snack-bar...
...I’d watched him for a little while and my son was the fourth or fifth child he’d shoved...

phrases.pCn: 法兰西第五共和国（成立于1958年）

words.tran: 第十五的；十五分之一的
第五十的；五十分之一的

trans.tranOther: one of five equal parts of something
one of five equal parts of something
